comments:
While smoke testing 20070329 IBuild, I noticed a dozen "Refreshing local" messages in the error log.  Below is the stack trace that accompanies this message.

I believe it requires the faces-config editor to be open and having set up some nav rules.  Edit and save one of the jsp's will yield the error, I believe.

This is not a new bug.   I just couldn't find a bugzilla for this.

The "hiding" of this exception is intentional.  It was previously completely suppressed.  This is an implementation problem that needs to be resolved, but currently does not appear to be causing problems.
*** Bug 173495 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

traces.message: The resource tree is locked for modifications.
